Seeing whether living standards has an impact on chronic repiratory infections in children by looking at the association of COPD prescriped inhalers with SIMD. 

Prescriptions data taken from August of every year to mitigate the effect of 'flu season' infections as a factor

Drugs:
LA bronchodilators - for those who experience symtoms regularly or have flare ups despite using SA, therefore infections more likely to be chronic/recurring

salmeterol, fromoterol, indacaterol, tiotropium, glycopyronium, aclidinium
